rgb_to_lab[source]

rgb_to_lab(image:Tensor, eps:float=1e-12)

Converts a RGB image to Luv.

See :class:~kornia.color.RgbToLuv for details.

Args: image (torch.Tensor): RGB image eps (float): for numerically stability when dividing. Default: 1e-8.

Returns: torch.Tensor : Luv image
